page.title: 16TOURISM IN MORFA BYCHAN
page.content: There are about 3000 caravans on various sites around the village and good sites for campers.With the exception of one small fun-fair,there are no man-made amusements exept for those provided by the largest of the caravan sites,which runs a very comprehensive range of entertainments. The area appeals mostly to those who choose a self-catering holiday and who enjoy the beach,the countryside and visits to interesting places in yhe locality.Evenings can be spent relaxed in their own accomodation,at entertainments or eating out at one of the increasingly varied types of cafe restaurant and hotel.Several of the caravan sites have shops and two have swimming pools.
